text: nissandeh allaah nahin sharamaata ki vah koee misaal pesh kare chaahe vah ho machchhar kee, balki usase bhee badhakar kisee tuchchh cheez kee. phir jo eemaan lae hai ve to jaanate hai ki vah unake rab kee or se saty hain; rahe inakaar karanevaale to ve kahate hai, "is misaal se allaah ka abhipraay kya hai?" isase vah bahuton ko bhatakane deta hai aur bahuton ko seedha maarg dikha deta hai, magar isase vah keval avagyaakaariyon hee ko bhatakane deta hai
